name: Medipill Store
description:
Hey! This is my second game made alone for a Game Jam.

The theme was "Neon", and the limitation was about money being a core mechanic. Therefore I decided to make a little pharmacy with a neon aesthetic!

I believe it is mainly finished, as it is a simple clicker, but I still want to add music, since I didn't have time to make it yet.

Thank you for checking out my game! <3
